entity.lycaniteaddonmod.fangtusk.descrip: Aglebemus warped and muitated by magic, they now roam as discusting large red beasts!
entity.lycaniteaddonmod.fangtusk.habitat: These beasts are usually found in swamplands.
entity.lycaniteaddonmod.fangtusk.combat: Fangtusks use their tusks to bash into you, causing bleeding and poison, ouch!
